title: Ozzycoin

comments.author: GeePeeU
comments.body: Any project that promises a consistent rise, is 100% always a scam.

comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: Quote from: GeePeeU on March 12, 2023, 05:05:06 PMAny project that promises a consistent rise, is 100% always a scam.I support your premise, there is no way to guarantee that the price of a commodity will keep increasing and this is a huge red flag for this project and will likely keep serious investors away. I don't know the type of products that will support the tokens even if it is oil and gold their prices too fluctuate up and down
